verses.text: \w Early|strong="H7925"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* next \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w got|strong="H7925"\w* \w up|strong="H7925"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H5265"\w* \w Shittim|strong="H7851"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. \w They|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* camped \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w crossing|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*

\w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: “\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w being|strong="H5971"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* positions \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w follow|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w keep|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H3808"\w* thousand cubits \w between|strong="H3045"\w* yourselves \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ark. \w Do|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H3045"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w traveled|strong="H5674"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w Consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H6942"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H5971"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5375"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, “\w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w exalt|strong="H1431"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* ark \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: ‘\w When|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* reach \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w edge|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.’”

\w So|strong="H5066"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w told|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H5066"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* continued, “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* God \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Girgashites|strong="H1622"\w*, Amorites, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3605"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w into|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w choose|strong="H3947"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H8147"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth—\w touch|strong="H5117"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w flowing|strong="H3381"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heap|strong="H5067"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w broke|strong="H5265"\w* camp \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w overflows|strong="H4390"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w banks|strong="H1415"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w season|strong="H3117"\w*. \w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* soon \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w reached|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w touched|strong="H2881"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*’s \w edge|strong="H7097"\w*,

\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flowing|strong="H3381"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w*. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* backed \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w upstream|strong="H3966"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* Adam, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* area \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Zarethan|strong="H6891"\w*, \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w flowing|strong="H3381"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Arabah|strong="H6160"\w* (\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*) \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w completely|strong="H8552"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*. \w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5048"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.
